text: Zach sits down with Dr. @uche_blackstock to talk about #racism in the Ivory, the #COVID19 vaccine, & the ways orgs need to prioritize #vaccine #accessibility for Black and brown people. Click the link in our bio or here to listen: https://t.co/MPaMaNUBYa #health #blackandbrown https://t.co/D8Rvr1AjpM
